Workflow.Name: Cost Center Budget Line - create Budget Periods for new line
Workflow.Description: When a new Cost Center Budget Line is created this process generates the appropriate periods and distributes the total budget line amount across them.

LocalizedName.description: Cost Center Budget Line - create Budget Periods for new line

Description.description: When a new Cost Center Budget Line is created this process generates the appropriate periods and distributes the total budget line amount across them.
